title: Silicon Valley Scaling Methods Applied to Political Transformation
description: Analyze Thiel's unprecedented application of tech scaling methodology to systematic political transformation and democratic conversion
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 4: The Bridge.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of Silicon Valley networks as transmission belts for oligarchic capture. Focus on specific dates, financial transactions, personnel movements, and institutional coordination mechanisms.
research_areas: Network effects in politics: each PayPal Mafia member's prominence increasing value for all participants
Platform thinking: creating infrastructure supporting multiple applications rather than single issues/candidates
Rapid iteration: 'move fast and break things' applied to political institutions exploiting vulnerabilities
International scaling: global investments and ideological networks creating systematic influence across multiple countries
